data.name: Dormant - Episode Galatea #1 - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is a "Dormant - Episode Galatea #1 -" soundtrack with 14 tracks.

* All tracks are available in MP3 and FLAC format.
* Looping music is recorded for two loops.
